channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Themify Portfolio Post
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Themify Portfolio Post

item.title: CVE-2023-0362|2024-08-02T05:10:55.555Z -- unknown -- themify%20portfolio%20post
item.description: Themify Portfolio Post WordPress plugin before 1.2.2 does not validate and escape some of its shortcode attributes before outputting them back in a page/post where the shortcode is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks.
